law.catch_line: Husband's interest in wife's realty same as wife's interest in his.
law.text: All the sections of this chapter, except KRS 392.100, that relate to the wife's dower or interest in the deceased husband's estate, shall apply in all cases, so far as may be, to the husband's interest in the wife's estate.
law.history: Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 117, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1956. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2148.
